title: Microsoft's Hegemony; Cloud Wars; Tiffany's Suitors: BI Radio
itunes:title: Microsoft's Hegemony; Cloud Wars; Tiffany's Suitors: BI Radio
description:
In this week’s Bloomberg Intelligence radio show, Washington, D.C.-based analyst James Bach discusses Microsoft’s landing of the Pentagon JEDI contract, Anurag Rana gives his take on the competitive landscape of the cloud and Deborah Aitken gives her take on Tiffany takeover prospects. Credit analyst Steve Flynn looks at SoftBank doubling down on WeWork and George Ferguson discusses the implications of IndiGo’s order for 300 Airbus A320s.


The BI Radio show broadcasts on Saturdays and Sundays on Bloomberg’s flagship radio station WBBR (1130 AM) in New York, 106.1 FM/1330 AM in Boston, 99.1 FM in Washington, 960 AM in the San Francisco bay area and channel 119 on SiriusXM. It also podcasts through Apple’s iTunes, Spotify and Luminary.


Bloomberg Intelligence, the research arm of Bloomberg L.P., provides in-depth analysis and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
